actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Departments of the Treasury and Health and Human Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from social security coverage retired Federal judges on active duty.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide that the pensions received by retired judges who are assigned to active duty shall not be treated as wages for purposes of title II.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from social security coverage retired Federal judges on active duty.
